casebody.data:
2002-1876 (La. 10/25/02)

Roy E. LITTLETON and Lonnie Ray Littleton v. COLONIAL PACIFIC LEASING CORPORATION and John Deere Insurance Company. No. 2002-C-1876. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Littleton, Lonnie Ray; — Plaintiff; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Union, 3rd Judicial District Court Div. B, No. 34,453; to the Court of Appeal, Second Circuit, No. 35,777-CA.

Denied.

CALOGERO, C.J., would grant the writ.
